import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

nodes = [10, 11, 12, 15, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 80, 90, 100]
mean = [6.939510775616086e-31, 8.364839002094963e-31, 0.08344136924409183, 0.20672867465527964, 0.27854533380477275, 0.255698166710518, 0.15479776129000694, 0.1820390374950974, 0.248007170369487, 0.233596496713293, 0.20700298579635174, 0.2423815084858419, 0.25008922688759244]
std_dev = [4.437342591868188e-32, 5.378597081052357e-32, 3.1031676915590914e-17, 2.1228933521263786e-16, 1.1775693440128312e-16, 2.22046049250313e-16, 1.962615573354719e-17, 5.2516013561222656e-17, 2.2887833992611187e-16, 8.777083671441753e-17, 8.777083671441753e-17, 8.092071311423672e-17, 8.953746215223828e-09]

plt.plot(nodes[:-1], mean[:-1])
plt.xlabel('number of nodes per block')
plt.ylabel('Mean')
plt.grid()
plt.show()
plt.close()

plt.plot(nodes[0:len(nodes)-1], std_dev[0:len(std_dev)-1])
plt.xlabel('number of nodes per block')
plt.ylabel('std_dev')
plt.grid()
plt.show()
plt.close()
